name: Apastron Demo
description:
Apastron is a retro styled open world FPS set on the planet of Coelho #6. You're a defender reborn every generation. Your overseer restores you (Phoebe Harper) to discover the origins of Coelho's unknown threat. It comes Aug 18th 2020 on steam 

In this demo hop into the firing range! Open chests to get randomized weapons based on rarity and blast baddies!

I hope you have fun! I've been working on this game since last September and I'm excited to get it out there. I update the full game almost every other day, so if you need to get a hold of me feel free to send me an email.

Contact Email: daydreamergamesofficial@gmail.com

Full Game  : https://store.steampowered.com/app/1264850/Apastron/
